ducks.title: Duck Presentation Bowl
bullets: The fine porcelain bowl was designed by FOXHALL DESIGN COMPANY and made especially for this series.

ducks.title: North American Duck Runner (Horizontal)
bullets: Attractive pebble background with a double border.
Made of premium grade nylon with stain-resistant Teflon.

ducks.title: North American Duck Runner (Vertical)
bullets: Attractive pebble background with a double border.
Made of premium grade nylon with stain-resistant Teflon.

ducks.title: Duck Wooden Box (Goldeneye)
bullets: Handsome wood box with tile on top.
Tan felt lining protects objects in box.
A perfect box for loose coins, stamps, and other items.

ducks.title: Exquisite 12-Piece Place Setting
bullets: Heirloom-quality china with double gold band.

boats.title: Exquisite 12-Piece Place Setting
bullets: Heirloom-quality china with double gold band.

boats.title: Chesapeake Bay Wooden Boats Presentation Bowl
bullets: This stunning presentation bowl is decorated with all six boats in the HISTORIC CHESAPEAKE BAY WOODEN BOATS series.
The fine porcelain bowl was designed by FOXHALL DESIGN COMPANY and made especially for this series.

boats.title: Boat Runner
bullets: Attractive pebble background with a double border.
Made of premium grade nylon with stain-resistant Teflon.
Only available in a vertical style

chesapeake.title: Chesapeake Country Welcome Mat
bullets: 100% Natural Coir, a renewable & sustainable resource.
This top quality doormat is made of the finest fibers to withstand all weather elements.

bullets: Contrasting sandwich bill available in navy only
